title: script font
content:
Does this look familiar to anyone?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023129/http:/typophile.com/files/image_67.jpg) | 103.66 KB |
author: hackum

comments.content:
It must be **[Mariette](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023129/http:/www.fontmenu.com/site/_Hand1.html)** by M.Bujardet ( [http://www.fontmenu.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023129/http:/www.fontmenu.com/ "http://www.fontmenu.com"))

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023129/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

That's it. Brilliant.  
Thanks a lot!
